com.facebook.buck.rules.modern.builders

Class IsolatedExecutionStrategy

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.buck.rules.modern.builders.IsolatedExecutionStrategy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BuildRuleStrategy, Closeable, AutoCloseable

    public class IsolatedExecutionStrategy
extends Object
    This wraps an IsolatedExecution implementation into a BuildRuleStrategy implementation. This handles setting up all the input files for isolated execution (the rule's inputs, the serialized rule data, serialized buck configs, etc). Handles recording outputs, etc.

      boolean canBuild(BuildRule instance)
      A rule will be built by the custom strategy only if canBuild() returns true.
